title: mas custom
body:
Welcome to Mark-a-Spot!

Report issues in your neighborhood – quickly and easily.

How it works:

  • Snap & Report – Take a photo and let AI identify the issue automatically.
  • Classic Report – Describe the problem yourself and pin it on the map.
  • Track – Follow the status as your report is processed.
  • Explore – See what's happening in your area.

Powered by

The open source civic issue tracking solution
